series.name: Introduction
series.description: Series of tutorials that will introduce the basic concepts

tutorials.title: Local smart contract development
tutorials.description: Follow the typical workflow from generating a new smart contract project, deploying code to the Local Fabric runtime, and testing your transactions via an application gateway.

tutorials.title: Create a cloud blockchain deployment
tutorials.description: Sign up for the IBM Blockchain Platform service on IBM Cloud, and configure a simple environment ready to deploy your smart contracts to.

tutorials.title: Deploying and transacting with IBM Cloud
tutorials.description: Export smart contracts from VSCode, deploy them in your environment on IBM Cloud, then send transactions from your local machine by creating a gateway.
